sentence: Like  most  construction  projects  across  Israel,  work  on  these  apartments  has  been  on  pause  since  Oct.  7,  the  day  thousands  of  fighters  from  the  Gaza-based  militant  group  Hamas  poured  across  the  border  into  Israel,  where  they  killed  about  1,400  people  and  kidnapped  hundreds  of  others.
The  events  of  Oct.  7,  in  which  Hamas  fighters  broke  into  Israeli  towns  and  homes  to  kill  and  kidnap  people,  has  Israelis  on  edge,  Gottlieb  said.
